title: ICYMI - Lori Lightfoot on Tackling the Coronavirus in Chicago and Spreading Hope with Humor
itunes:title: ICYMI - Lori Lightfoot on Tackling the Coronavirus in Chicago and Spreading Hope with Humor
description:
Chicago mayor Lori Lightfoot discusses the steps her administration is taking to battle COVID-19 and its disproportionate impact on the city's communities of color.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
